name: Harry Potter for Kinect
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Experience Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry like never before in the all-new Harry Potter for Kinect video game exclusively on KINECT™ for Xbox 360®.  Using KINECT capability, scan your face to create a wizard avatar that looks like you – and then play with that avatar in the game.
